name: Florence Welch
description: '''Florence Leontine Mary Welch''' (born 28 August 1986) is an English singer and songwriter. She is the lead vocalist and primary songwriter of the [[indie rock]] band [[Florence and the Machine]]. The band's debut studio album, ''[[Lungs (album)|Lungs]]'' (2009), topped the [[UK Albums Chart]] and won the [[Brit Awards|Brit Award]] for Best British Album. Their next five albums also achieved chart success. In 2018, Welch released a book titled ''Useless Magic'', a collection of lyrics and poems written by her, along with illustrations.
